dcterms:description: The dataset contains multi-contrast, multi-view, multi-slice, and multi-coil cardiac magnetic resonance imaging data from 300 subjects, including short-axis (SAX), two-chamber (2CH), three-chamber (3CH), four-chamber (4CH) long-axis (LAX) views, and T1 and T2 mappings. The authors used the 4CH-LAX cine images and corresponding segmentation labels, which were manually labeled by an expert radiologist.
